text: Ron or Ronnie or Ronald Harris may refer to: ==Sports== * Ron Harris (Australian footballer) (1924–2006), played for Hawthorn in the VFL * Ron Harris (footballer) (born 1944), 1960s English footballer * Ron Harris, one of the two American professional wrestlers who wrestled as The Harris Brothers * Ron Harris (ice hockey) (born 1942), former ice hockey player * Ronnie Harris (American boxer, born 1948), American lightweight boxer; 1968 Olympic gold medalist * Ronald Allen Harris (1947–1980), American lightweight boxer; 1964 Olympic bronze medalist * Ronnie Harris (American football) (born 1970), former professional American football player * Ronnie Harris (sprinter) (born 1956), American former sprinter ==Others== * Ronald Dale Harris (born 1956), former computer programmer for the Nevada Gaming Control Board * Ron Harris (photographer) (1933–2017), nude photographer * Ron Harris, a detective character from the TV show Barney Miller
title: Ron Harris
